inclusion.criterion: syncope, pre-syncope or palpitations less frequently than every 24 hours
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: without loss of consciousness defined as transient dizziness, leghtheadedness,
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: unsteadiness or weak spells: syncopal events with or without warning: palpitations
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects with non-diagnostic 24 hours of monitoring related to symptoms within 45 days of enrollment into study
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Subject able to understand, assent to , and willing to sign the Informed Consent Form.

exclusion.criterion: Post Myocardial infarction less than or equal to 3 months
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Unstable angina defined as chest pain at rest, new onset of angina, or a change in existing patterns of angina.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subjects who are candidatees for or have had recent (less than or equal to 3 monthr) heart valve surgery
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: History of sustained ventricualr tachycardia or ventricular fibrillation
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: documented EF 35% or less with complex ectopy defined as PVC's 10 or greater per hour.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subject is less than 18 years old at the time of signing informed consent.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Any condition which may prohibit the completion of or compliance with the protocol.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has history of CAD and prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. Recently discharged after negative work-up for syncope which included implantation of cardiac monitoring device.
